biotools.summary:
sci.AI is a free platform that “understands” research papers and “explains” them to analytics and search algorithms.  

The platform takes all biomedical papers, trials, and projects and interlinks research findings in a semantic graph. Then, it mimics human reasoning to return discovered pathways and support research
